DOC.brief_title: Phase I Trial Tanibirumab Advanced Metastatic Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase I , first-in-human , open-label , non-randomized , dose-escalating study Tanibirumab fully human monoclonal antibody vascular endothelial growth factor receptor 2 ( VEGFR2/KDR ) . This study enroll patient advance metastatic cancer refractory standard therapeutic option . Tanibirumab administer intravenously patient 60 minute Day 1 , 8 , 15 ( subject change pending PK toxicity data ) . Each treatment cycle minimum 28 day length . The dose escalation study employ 3 + 3 design design identify RP2D base safety , tolerability PK RP2D . This study expect enroll total approximately 18-24 patient .
